name: Valor and Glory: Napoleonic Wars
description:
Take on the campaign and lead one of 5 factions in an epic war to defend your lands and drive out the enemies.

Key Features:

Turn the world into your battlefield:

Pillage and capture enemy territory, fight enemy troops under any given circumstance

Assume control of five unique factions:

Choose from the greatest powers striving for victory

Lead your armies to victory:

Let the heroes of the time fight your war in a fast-paced tactical turn-based combat
